title: THN Recap: Top Cybersecurity Threats, Tools, and Practices (Nov 18 - Nov 24)
description: We hear terms like “state-sponsored attacks” and “critical vulnerabilities” all the time, but what’s really going on behind those words? This week’s cybersecurity news isn’t just about hackers and headlines—it’s about how digital risks shape our lives in ways we might not even realize.
